name: Adventures of Mathamachicken
description:
This is a simple platform game. You play the Mathamchicken collecting pull request and avoiding project managers. Collect 25 pull request to win.

This is my first game jam, actually first game. The first thing a dev does when trying something new is to start with a working example. I thought using a example project would be cheating, so I followed a tutorial to a MVP. I then went back and refined ideas and assets. I had a blast doing this. I am a Sr. developer for a fortune 100 company, and mostly develop in C#, Angular, and SQL Server. I started listing to the pod cast a while back and have really enjoyed it. Keep the episodes coming.

Broken: BG popin, player sprite flipping, double get coins, my will, and more....
